```suggestion
        metadata.put(auth, s"Bearer $headerValue")
```
Should it not be like this?

`AuthServiceStatic` does not require the `Bearer` prefix. To use the above change, I'd need to change
```
AuthServiceStatic({
  case "Alice" => Claims(...)
})
```
to
```
AuthServiceStatic({
  case "Bearer Alice" => Claims(...)
})
```
(at the top of the same file)

Using an authorization type ("Basic" or "Bearer") does not seem to be strictly necessary (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7235#section-4.2), but I'll change it anyway.
